SimTernReferenceRanges.BMP: Sodium 135-145 mmol/L Potassium 3.4-4.8 mmol/L Chloride 100-108 mmol/L Bicarbonate (HCO3) 23-31.9 mmol/L BUN 8-25 mg/dL Creatinine 0.6-1.5 mg/dL Glucose 70-110 mg/dL Calcium 8.5-10.5 mg/dL
SimTernReferenceRanges.CMP: Alkaline Phosphatase Male : 45-115 U/L Female: 30-100 U/L Albumin 3.3-5.0 g/dL ALT Male: 10-40 U/L Female: 9-32 U/L AST Male: 10-55 U/L Female: 7-30 U/L Total Protein 6.0-8.3 g/dL Bilirubin, Direct 0-0.4 mg/dL Bilirubin, Total 0-1.0 mg/dL
SimTernReferenceRanges.CBC: White Blood Cells (WBC): 4.0-11.0 x 103/µL Red Blood Cell (RBC): Male: 4.3-6.0 x 106/µL Hemoglobin (Hb): Male: 13.5-17.5 g/dL Female: 12.0-16.0 g/dL Hematocrit (Hct): Male: 41-53% Female: 36-48% Mean Corpuscular Volume (MCV): 80-100 fL Mean Corpuscular Hemoglobin (MCH): 25-35 pg/cell Mean Corpuscular Hemoglobin Concentration (MCHC): 31-35 g/dL Red Blood Cell Distribution Width (RDW): 11.5-14.5%
SimTernReferenceRanges.CoagulationFactors: PT 11.0-13.7 seconds International Normalized Ratio (INR) Normal: 1.0 Standard Intensity: 2.0-3.0 High Intensity: 2.5-3.5 PTT 21.0-33.0 seconds
SimTernReferenceRanges.Urinalysis: pH 5.0-9.0 Specific Gravity 1.001-1.035 Protein 0-20 mg/dL Glucose Negative Ketone Bodies Negative Bilirubin Negative Red Blood Cells 0-3 RBC/HPF White Blood Cells Negative Epithelial Cells Negative Leukocyte Esterase Negative Nitrite Negative
